text: Hallangiidae is a family of Acoela. It contains 2 species in 2 genera. ==Genera== There are two genera in the family Hallangiidae. *Aechmalotus Beklemischev, 1915 *Hallangia Westblad, 1946 ==Species== There are two species in the family Hallangiidae. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:left;" |- !scope="col"| Name !scope="col"| Image !scope="col"| Distribution !scope="col"| Description |- |scope="row" align="left"|Aechmalotus pyrula Beklemischev 1915 | | | |- |scope="row" align="left"|Hallangia proporoides Westblad 1946 | | | |- |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:Acoelomorphs
title: Hallangiidae
